name: Improved Sunder
description: You are skilled at damaging your foes' weapons and armor.
prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1
benefit: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a sunder combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to sunder an item. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense whenever an opponent tries to sunder your gear.
normal: You provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a sunder combat maneuver.
staminaText: When you are the target of a sunder combat maneuver, you can spend a number of stamina points up to your Strength or Dexterity bonus, whichever is greater. Your CMD increases by that number for that sunder attempt.
mythicDescription: Your mighty smashing blows demolish objects.
mythicBenefit: You gain a bonus equal to half your tier on checks to sunder, and to your CMD when an opponent tries to sunder an object used by you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Improved Sunder.
description_zh: 你善于攻击对手的武器和盔甲。
prerequisites_zh: 力量13，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+1。
benefit_zh: 当你使用破武战技时不会引发对手的藉机攻击。此外，你在破武检定上获得+2加值，在对抗破武的战技防御上也获得+2加值。
